text: Charles Keene (born Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania) was an American racecar driver active during the formative years of the auto racing. ==Career statistics== ===By season=== {|class="wikitable" !Season !Class !Team !Race !Win !Podium !Pole !FLap !Pts !Plcd |- align="right" ! 1914 | AAA National Championship | Beaver Bullet | 3 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 0 | 60 | 27th |- align="right" |} ==Indy 500 results== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Year !Car !Start !Qual !Rank !Finish !Laps !Led !Retired |- !1914 |5 |27 |86.870 |27 |8 |200 |0 |Running |- |} {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Starts |1 |- !Poles |0 |- !Front Row |0 |- !Wins |0 |- !Top 5 |0 |- !Top 10 |1 |- !Retired |0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Profile on driverdb.com Category:Indianapolis 500 drivers Category:People from Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania Category:Racing drivers from Pennsylvania Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
